title: similar to avenir
content:
Hi  
Can anybody help me identify the font used in the food hygiene rating text please (ignore the letters replaced by knife and fork). I'm assuming the numbers are in the same font. It's similar to Avenir but not quite right.  
Many thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [5-rating-crop.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141014074259/http:/typophile.com/files/5-rating-crop.jpg) | 118.95 KB |
author: littlejen74

comments.content: Janna looks nearly identical to Avenir.
Agree with Jodie. I think you should have to consider words and numerals are not set in the same font because they're definitely not coming from the same type.

I can only find Janna as an arabic font. Not really what I was after.  
Any ideas on a font for the numbers?  
Many thanks
